item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hi. Welcome to my blog. My name is Roxanne but I also go by the nickname Xanne3d. I created this blog to practice my writing skills. Here I like to write about my 3D printing projects, storys, book reviews, and more. I am also a middle school student so please don’t epect me to hae the best writing skills. Outside my blog work, I have a YouTube channel were there are post about my robotic projects

Xanne3D
